name: Loan Pending Approval
subject: {{ doc.loan_product }} - {{ doc.borrower }} - Pending Your Approval
message_template:
A new loan application is pending your approval:

Loan Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Borrower: {{ doc.borrower }}
  • Product: {{ doc.loan_product }}
  • Requested Amount: {{ doc.requested_amount }}
  • Application Date: {{ doc.application_date }}

Please review and take action on this application.

name: Loan Credit Check Required
subject: Credit Check Required - {{ doc.borrower }} ({{ doc.name }})
message_template:
A loan requires credit verification:

Loan Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Borrower: {{ doc.borrower }}
  • Employment Type: {{ doc.employment_type }}
  • Annual Income: {{ doc.annual_income }}
  • Government Verification Required: {{ 'Yes' if doc.government_verification_required else 'No' }}

Please conduct the necessary credit checks and verify the borrower's creditworthiness.

name: Loan Approved Notification
subject: Loan Approved - {{ doc.borrower }} ({{ doc.name }})
message_template:
Congratulations! Your loan application has been approved.

Loan Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Product: {{ doc.loan_product }}
  • Approved Amount: {{ doc.approved_amount }}
  • Interest Rate: {{ doc.interest_rate }}%
  • Tenure: {{ doc.tenure_months }} months

Please contact your loan officer to proceed with disbursement.

name: Loan Rejected Notification
subject: Loan Application - Status Update ({{ doc.name }})
message_template:
Your loan application has been rejected.

Loan Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Borrower: {{ doc.borrower }}
  • Rejection Reason: Please contact the branch for more information.

You may reapply after addressing the feedback provided by our team.

name: Loan Disbursement Completed
subject: Loan Disbursement Completed - {{ doc.borrower }} ({{ doc.loan }})
message_template:
Your loan has been successfully disbursed.

Disbursement Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.loan }}
  • Disbursement Amount: {{ doc.disbursed_amount }}
  • Disbursement Date: {{ doc.disbursement_date }}
  • Bank Account: {{ doc.bank_account }}
  • Reference Number: {{ doc.reference_number }}

The funds have been transferred to your account. Please verify receipt and report any discrepancies immediately.

name: Payment Due Reminder
subject: Payment Due Reminder - {{ doc.borrower }} ({{ doc.loan }})
message_template:
This is a friendly reminder that your loan payment is due.

Payment Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.loan }}
  • Due Date: {{ doc.due_date }}
  • Principal Amount: {{ doc.principal_amount }}
  • Interest Amount: {{ doc.interest_amount }}
  • Total Due: {{ doc.total_amount }}

Please make the payment by the due date to avoid penalties and maintain your credit rating.

name: Payment Overdue Alert
subject: Overdue Payment Notice - {{ doc.borrower }} ({{ doc.loan }})
message_template:
Your loan payment is now overdue.

Overdue Payment Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.payment_reference }}
  • Original Due Date: {{ doc.due_date }}
  • Days Overdue: {{ doc.days_overdue }}
  • Outstanding Amount: {{ doc.outstanding_amount }}

Please make immediate payment to avoid further penalties and potential legal action. Contact our collection team for assistance.

name: Payment Received Confirmation
subject: Payment Received Confirmation - {{ doc.borrower }} ({{ doc.loan }})
message_template:
Thank you for your loan repayment.

Payment Details:

  • Loan ID: {{ doc.loan }}
  • Payment Date: {{ doc.payment_date }}
  • Principal Paid: {{ doc.principal_amount }}
  • Interest Paid: {{ doc.interest_amount }}
  • Penalty Paid: {{ doc.penalty_amount }}
  • Total Payment: {{ doc.total_payment_amount }}

Your payment has been recorded. Thank you for being a valued customer.
